verses.verse: He that dashes <S%H6327><s%> in pieces is come <S%H5927><s%> up before <S%H5921><s%> your face: <S%H6440><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> the fortification, <S%H4694><s%> watch <S%H6822><s%> the way, <S%H1870><s%> make your loins <S%H4975><s%> strong, <S%H2388><s%> fortify <S%H553><s%> your power <S%H3581><s%> mightily. <S%H3966><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has turned <S%H7725><s%> away the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> as the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> for the emptiers <S%H1238><s%> have emptied <S%H1238><s%> them out, and marred <S%H7843><s%> their vine <S%H2156><s%> branches. <S%H2156><s%>

The shield <S%H4043><s%> of his mighty <S%H1368><s%> men is made red, <S%H119><s%> the valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H582><s%> are in scarlet: <S%H8529><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%> shall be with flaming <S%H784><s%> torches <S%H6393><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his preparation, <S%H3559><s%> and the fir <S%H1265><s%> trees shall be terribly shaken. <S%H7477><s%>

The chariots <S%H7393><s%> shall rage <S%H1984><s%> in the streets, <S%H2351><s%> they shall jostle <S%H8264><s%> one against another <S%H8264><s%> in the broad <S%H7339><s%> ways: they shall seem <S%H4758><s%> like torches, <S%H3940><s%> they shall run <S%H7323><s%> like the lightning. <S%H1300><s%>

He shall recount <S%H2142><s%> his worthies: <S%H117><s%> they shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> in their walk; <S%H1979><s%> they shall make haste <S%H4116><s%> to the wall <S%H2346><s%> thereof, and the defense <S%H5526><s%> shall be prepared. <S%H3559><s%>
The gates <S%H8179><s%> of the rivers <S%H5104><s%> shall be opened, <S%H6605><s%> and the palace <S%H1964><s%> shall be dissolved. <S%H4127><s%>

And Huzzab <S%H5324><s%> shall be led away <S%H1540><s%> captive, <S%H1540><s%> she shall be brought <S%H5927><s%> up, and her maids <S%H519><s%> shall lead <S%H5090><s%> her as with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of doves, <S%H3123><s%> beating <S%H8608><s%> on their breasts. <S%H3824><s%>

But Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> is of old <S%H3117><s%> like a pool <S%H1295><s%> of water: <S%H4325><s%> yet they shall flee <S%H5127><s%> away. Stand, <S%H5975><s%> stand, <S%H5975><s%> shall they cry; but none <S%H369><s%> shall look <S%H6437><s%> back. <S%H6437><s%>

Take <S%H962><s%> you the spoil <S%H962><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> take <S%H962><s%> the spoil <S%H962><s%> of gold: <S%H2091><s%> for there is none <S%H369><s%> end <S%H7097><s%> of the store <S%H8498><s%> and glory <S%H3519><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> the pleasant <S%H2532><s%> furniture. <S%H3627><s%>

She is empty, <S%H950><s%> and void, <S%H4003><s%> and waste: <S%H1110><s%> and the heart <S%H3820><s%> melts, <S%H4549><s%> and the knees <S%H1290><s%> smite <S%H6375><s%> together, and much <S%H2479><s%> pain <S%H2479><s%> is in all <S%H3605><s%> loins, <S%H4975><s%> and the faces <S%H6440><s%> of them all <S%H3605><s%> gather <S%H6908><s%> blackness. <S%H6289><s%>

Where <S%H346><s%> is the dwelling <S%H4583><s%> of the lions, <S%H738><s%> and the feeding place <S%H4829><s%> of the young <S%H3715><s%> lions, <S%H3715><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the lion, <S%H739><s%> even the old lion, <S%H3833><s%> walked, <S%H1980><s%> and the lion's <S%H738><s%> whelp, <S%H1482><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> made them afraid? <S%H2729><s%>

The lion <S%H738><s%> did tear <S%H2963><s%> in pieces enough <S%H1767><s%> for his whelps, <S%H1484><s%> and strangled <S%H2614><s%> for his lionesses, <S%H3833><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> his holes <S%H2356><s%> with prey, <S%H2964><s%> and his dens <S%H4585><s%> with shred. <S%H2966><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> you, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and I will burn <S%H1197><s%> her chariots <S%H7393><s%> in the smoke, <S%H6227><s%> and the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> your young <S%H3715><s%> lions: <S%H3715><s%> and I will cut <S%H3772><s%> off your prey <S%H2964><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your messengers <S%H4397><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> be heard. <S%H8085><s%>
